page.title: 19 TUBNEY INDUSTRIAL ESTATE
page.content: Tubney Wood seems a most unlikely place for an industrial estate.Yet in square 4499 there is one. The huts are rented to people involved in INDUSTRY and service activities such as:window making and installing(in the hut that was the canteen when it was an army camp); weather monitors(wind vanes etc.);road safety aids e.g.bollards;antique furniture restoration;engineering design. The ADVANTAGES of this site include:cheap rents compared to UNITS on modern industrial estates;and being near to the A338 and A420 roads ACCESSIBILITY.Most of the firms need only small buildings so the pre-existing army huts are fine.(See TUBNEY WOODS page 18 for more detail)
